content: customize this tank to any length that works for you this is a made to measure size inclusive pattern the stitch is incredibly easy yet so much fun we use three strings to create a tri colour stitch if you can do a single_crochet you can make this tank that is designed for beginners the summer striped crochet crop top tank is designed to be fitted and cropped however you can customize it with this made to measure size inclusive pattern it features simple shoulder straps that are crocheted directly on to the front of the top this is a free and easy crochet pattern that is made to measure size inclusive and beginner friendly
